ActJudges Act
SubjectMargaret Joyce Locke ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Charles C. Locke
PrecisGranting of an annuity to MARGARET JOYCE LOCKE, widow of the Hon. Charles C. Locke, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective October 2, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
